thread.title: Really great hotel in central location
thread.title_full: Really great hotel in central location - Review of New Hotel Roblin La Madeleine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ben S
title: Really great hotel in central location
text: Really enjoyed our stay here for a city break and sightseeing. If you want to see Paris you won't be spending much time in the room anyway, but the beds were really comfy and a decent sized room for what we needed. The breakfast was good and the staff were really helpful, couldn't do enough for you, including recommending local places to eat and booking taxis. Would definitely stay here again.
